packages.title: Basic SEO Optimization
packages.shortDesc: Perfect for new websites needing essential SEO improvements.
packages.fullDesc: This package includes foundational SEO setup including keyword placement, metadata optimization, image compression, mobile performance enhancement, and Google Search Console setup. Ideal for beginners wanting search visibility.

packages.title: SEO Growth Package
packages.shortDesc: Boost rankings with advanced SEO techniques and tracking.
packages.fullDesc: A complete SEO package with deeper keyword research, speed optimization, competitor analysis, monthly performance tracking, and structured data. Made for growing brands that want search dominance.

packages.title: Elite SEO + Analytics System
packages.shortDesc: Full SEO automation, analytics integration, and keyword tracking.
packages.fullDesc: Our enterprise solution includes in-depth SEO planning, content strategy, real-time analytics dashboards, backlink audits, and proactive improvements every week. Ideal for serious brands.
